ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, trade skills.  For me it is baking.  20 fish fillets cost me less than 4gp to make and sell for about 1pp 2gp to merchants.  I made a good amount of money
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, trade skills. For me it is baking. 20 fish fillets cost me less
than 4gp to make and sell for about 1pp 2gp to merchants. I made a
good amount of money on the boat from Butcherblock to Freeport and
back to get my 10th level song.

Adagia, bard of 10 songs
Luclin



--- In eqbards@onelist.com, "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@h...> wrote:
> Hehe, my rogue on Tallon Zek (who I just made 2 nights ago) is
level 6,
> completely un-twinked. Has full leather armor, a Giant Snake Fang
and is
> starting to buy her banded already. What you're doing wrong is not
using
> trade skills ;) Some of them are profitable even for NPC's ;) I
can make
> almost 5 platinum an hour with my rogue ;) (at level 6 that's not
bad at
> all ;)
>
> Trade skills ;) Specifically: Tailoring ;)
>
> >
> > So you're level 10, untwinked, and wearing BANDED??? What am I
doing
> wrong?
> > <sigh>
> >
